suite.name: Varian Home Page

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

test.name: Verify That URL Directs Opens Varial Login Page

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

test.doc: Verifies that urls directs us to the login page

test.name: Verify That Login Instruction Appears Upon Navigation To URL

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

test.doc: Verifies that upon nvgation to login urls, a login instruction appears

test.name: Verify That The Language Options Appears
